isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - INSTALL - CAB DOOR ELECTRIC WINDOW AND DOOR LOCK SWITCH

svcproc.title: CAB DOOR ELECTRIC WINDOW AND DOOR LOCK SWITCH

svcsubproc.title: Install Front Cab Door Electric Window and Door Lock Switch on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 94 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Connect both wiring harness connectors (Item 6) to the front cab door electric window and door lock switch (Item 1), driver side shown.

Once both wiring harness connectors (Item 6) are connected to the front cab door electric window and door lock switch (Item 1), push wiring harness into opening in cab door trim panel (Item 5), driver side shown.

With the wiring harness properly positioned inside cab door trim panel (Item 5), position front cab door electric window and door lock switch (Item 1) into the opening of cab door trim panel and push it down until the spring retaining clips (Item 4) secure it in place, driver side shown.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side front cab door electric window and door lock switch.

svcsubproc.title: Install Rear Cab Door Electric Window and Door Lock Switch on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 95 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Connect both wiring harness connectors (Item 6) to the rear cab door electric window and door lock switch (Item 1), driver side shown.

Once both wiring harness connectors (Item 6) are connected to the rear cab door electric window and door lock switch (Item 1), push wiring harness into opening in cab door trim panel (Item 5), driver side shown.

With the wiring harness properly positioned inside cab door trim panel (Item 5), position rear cab door electric window and door lock switch (Item 1) into the opening of cab door trim panel and push it down until the spring retaining clips (Item 4) secure it in place, driver side shown.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side rear cab door electric window and door lock switch.
